qas.question: In which year was reports about Beyonce performing for Muammar Gaddafi surface?
Who did Beyonce donate the money to earned from her shows?
Beyonce became the first female artist to perform solo in 20 years at which stage?
Which organization did Beyonce's spokespeople confirm her donations to?
Beyonce was listed in 2011 as the highest paid performer per what?
Hoe did everyone learn that Beyonce performed for Kaddafi?
Who did she tell about the donation?
Who did Beyoncé perform privately for in 2011?
Who released the information about Beyoncé's performance for the Libyan ruler?
Which organization did Beyoncé donate her pay for the private performance to?
Beyoncé was the first female singer to headline what at the 2011 Glastonbury Festival?

context: In <a0_0><a6_0>2011<a6_0/><a0_0/>, <a5_0>documents obtained by <a10_0>WikiLeaks<a10_0/><a5_0/> revealed that Beyoncé was one of many entertainers who performed for the family of Libyan ruler <a9_0>Muammar Gaddafi.<a9_0/> Rolling Stone reported that the music industry was urging them to return the money they earned for the concerts; a spokesperson for Beyoncé later confirmed to <a3_0><a7_0>The Huffington Post<a7_0/><a3_0/> that she donated the money to the <a1_0><a11_0>Clinton Bush Haiti Fund<a1_0/>.<a11_0/> Later that year she became the first solo female artist to headline the main <a12_0>Pyramid stage<a12_0/> at <a2_0>the 2011 <a8_0>Glastonbury Festival<a8_0/><a2_0/> in over twenty years, and was named the highest-paid performer in the world per <a4_0>minute<a4_0/>.
